long_description: Ideal for Micro 4/3 and DSLR kits with room to spare, the medium Mountainsmith Zoom camera case protects your photo gear and keeps your camera handy for those fleeting moments you want to capture. Clamshell access to internal padded compartment with camera-carry dividers. Zippered accessory pockets under lid and on front panel. Removable waistbelt and shoulder strap; attachment point for lens case (sold separately). Integrated raincover. Water-resistant, 500-denier high-tenacity nylon exterior fabric panels; foam cushioning; 210-denier lining. Interior dimensions: 10 x 6.75 x 5 in.
short_description: Ideal for Micro 4/3 and DSLR kits with room to spare, the medium Mountainsmith Zoom camera case protects your photo gear and keeps your camera handy for those fleeting moments you want to capture.
